trends: There has been one other sighting in Aguadilla
There were no other sightings in Aguadilla on or around July 25th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my mom in the car to my hospital where he worked. I was next to an old bridge in Aguadilla some light came in the sky in the speed of light!!! I was going to tell my mom but she wouldn't believe me it kept following my direction all the time. It was about 500 ft. in the air!!! Later I was going to tell my brother about it, but when i see later, it was gone. That's one of the most incredible things tat has ever happened to me. And I will always remember that.
Summary: I was 7 years old when it happened!!! Right now I am 11 years old.
